name: Colored Ninjas
description:
You are a ninja who has been exiled from your previous homeland. On your way to find a new home, you are attacked by a group of evil ninjas who plan to kill you! Your only escape is to find the source of the ninjas and destroy it.

Controls:

WASD: Move
IJKL: Shoot
Click+Drag window: Move Camera

Made in Clickteam Fusion 2.5 Developer in 48 hours for Ludum Dare 31. Famitracker used for the audio.
